Pre-Game Insights: Gabon rebounded from a 4-1 drubbing by Morocco in the opening game of their AFCON qualifying series by securing a 2-0 victory over Central African Republic in their second match a couple of days later.
All the meetings between both sides have been in qualifying matches – two each for the World Cup and AFCON – and the Panthers won both times they have hosted this fixture.
Miscellaneous Highlights: This is the first match of the 2025 Africa Cup of Nations qualifying campaign for both teams.
Others: Lesotho kicked off their AFCON qualifying campaign with a 3-1 defeat to Central African Republic in the first round of qualifiers and were forced to react in their second game against Morocco, but succumbed late in the game, conceding a 93rd-minute goal to lose 1-0.
